name: There Will Be Light
description:
The world is dark and empty. There is only one spark of light left - you. Use light to find your way to the all-promising sphere. But be aware of the obstacles, hidden in the dark.

Credits:

  • Tarek Abdel-Aziz
  • Franz Josef Huber
  • Markus Mennel
  • Fabian Schober
  • Mathias Lux
